                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select floor(rand()*2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-----------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | floor(rand()*2) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-----------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |               0 |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-----------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ceiling()函数

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                向上取整

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select ceiling(rand()*2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ceiling(rand()*2) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                 2 |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select ceiling(rand()*2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ceiling(rand()*2) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                 1 |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +-------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                concat_ws()函数

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                按指定格式拼接字符串

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                格式：
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                concat_ws('指定符号', 字符串1, 字符串2)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select concat_ws('~',2,3);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | concat_ws('~',2,3) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 2~3                |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                也可以利用此函数达到信息泄露

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select concat_ws('~',(select database()),3);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | concat_ws('~',(select database()),3) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ctfsu~3                              |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                as 别名
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                group by 排序
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                完整注入语句
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                24
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select concat_ws('~',(select database()),3) from xml;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | concat_ws('~',(select database()),3) |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ctfsu~3                              |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ctfsu~3                              |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +--------------------------------------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2 rows in set (0.00 sec)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mysql> select concat_ws('~',(select database()),3) as a from xml group by a;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +---------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | a       |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +---------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ctfsu~3 |
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +---------+
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1 row in set (0.00 sec)
